attributes.action: allow the Red Arrows to perform at the forthcoming Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I object to the reason given that they
are too militarily British. This appears to be a further cringing abasement to so-called political correctness. Those taking this decision
need to be reminded that Britain is carrying the greatest European burden of military, political and welfare aid in many parts of the world. I and many
others are proud of the Red Arrows' flying expertise and their demonstration of exellence of our aircraft industry.  I trust this decision can be reversed to allow them to perform.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
